question: What is Days?
answer: Days is a platform & collaboration software that connects the best editors, cinematographers & creators to anyone who wants to make content. Days is for businesses, vloggers, and anyone who wants to make end to end content produced on all platforms. Helping you capture the best days of your life.

question: What can I create with Days?
answer: Our goals at Days is to connect you with the best creatives in the world and let you decide :).

question: How can I join Days as a creator?
answer: We are currently looking for creators to help us build & grow the platform. If interested, please reachout to solomonpickett@gmail.com
